Interface CourseDBStructureInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseDBStructure
public interface CourseDBStructureInterface
This is the interface to the Course Database Structure Class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    add(CourseDBElement element)
    Adds a CourseDBElement object to the CourseDBStructure using the hashcode of the CourseDatabaseElemen object's crn value.
    CourseDBElement
    get(int crn)
    Find a courseDatabaseElement based on the key (crn) of the courseDatabaseElement If the CourseDatabaseElement is found return it If not, throw an IOException
    int
    getTableSize()
    Returns the size of the ConcordanceDataStructure (number of indexes in the array)
    ArrayList<String>
    showAll()
     

  • Method Details

    • add

      void add(CourseDBElement element)
      Adds a CourseDBElement object to the CourseDBStructure using the hashcode of the CourseDatabaseElemen object's crn value. If the CourseDatabaseElement already exists, exit quietly
      Parameters:
      element - the CourseDBElement to be added to CourseDBStructure

    • get

      CourseDBElement get(int crn) throws IOException
      Find a courseDatabaseElement based on the key (crn) of the courseDatabaseElement If the CourseDatabaseElement is found return it If not, throw an IOException
      Parameters:
      crn - crn (key) whose associated courseDatabaseElement is to be returned
      Returns:
      a CourseDBElement whose crn is mapped to the key
      Throws:
      IOException - if key is not found

    • showAll

      ArrayList<String> showAll()
      Returns:
      an array list of string representation of each course in the data structure separated by a new line. Refer to the following example: Course:CMSC500 CRN:39999 Credits:4 Instructor:Nobody InParticular Room:SC100 Course:CMSC600 CRN:4000 Credits:4 Instructor:Somebody Room:SC200

    • getTableSize

      int getTableSize()
      Returns the size of the ConcordanceDataStructure (number of indexes in the array)
